name: VAIA Market Data Fetcher
description: VAIA Market Data Fetcher which gets data from hotel websites and stores it in the database

scripts.dev:scrape: set NODE_ENV=development&& set UNIT_TEST=true&& set UNIT_TEST_MODULE=scrape&& node index.js
scripts.dev:ai: set NODE_ENV=development&& set UNIT_TEST=true&& set UNIT_TEST_MODULE=ai&& node index.js
